::Lord Jhiaxus::

Now with more anger in his voice, Jhiaxus steps forward, holding a blaster at Nightlight's head.

Jhiaxus: DO NOT LIE TO ME! Where is Hot Rod?! Rodimus Prime?! Whatever he calls himself these days!

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Nighlight:
 
 "i dont know"answered calmed Nighlight 
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 > 
 > Jhiaxus: The sum of the Matrix's power is far more then that of 
 it's holder. I know he is on this planet. Tell me, little one, where 
 is he? The old Autobot lead me this far, you will tell me the rest.
 > 
 > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> 
 wrote:                                  OOC: ok
 >  
 >  Nighlight:
 >  
 >  "That means, that you're related with original Decpticons, I guess 
 >  that Hydras would be more than happy to know that he has a far 
 >  relative" said Nighlight.
 >  
 >  She saw a lil chance, if she pretended have a lack understanding 
 she 
 >  could find the way to scape or better let the others rescue 
 Windlord 
 >  and Kup. 
 >  
 >  While she disgised her fear with a puzzled face she said "But the 
 >  Matrix of leadership... how could be that? Even Unicron was 
 >  destroyed  with it"
 >  
 >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  >
 >  > OOC: He will in battle. There hasn't been many shots fired yet.
 >  > 
 >  > ::Lord Jhiaxus::
 >  > 
 >  > Jhiaxus laughs at Nightlight's lack of understanding.
 >  > 
 >  > Jhiaxus: Silly girl. I AM your evolution. The second generation 
 of 
 >  Transformers, decendents of Cybertron's originals has formed, 
 >  unnoticed, elsewhere in this galaxy. I represent them. I am the 
 next 
 >  generation of Transformer life. My power surpasses even the 
 greatest 
 >  of your generation. Even the Matrix bearer!
 >  
 >  
 >      
 >                        
 > 
 >        
 > ---------------------------------
 > Got a little couch potato? 
 > Check out fun summer activities for kids.
 >
